description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the Grimdark weaponry of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, including the Bolt Rifle, Bolt Sniper Rifle, Bolt Carbine, and Auto Bolt Rifle. Lots of bolters, basically.

00:00 Intro
00:44 Bolt Rifle
05:57 Auto Bolt Rifle
08:17 Bolt Rifle with Underslung Grenade Launcher
09:30 Stalker Bolt Rifle
13:37 Scope Latin
14:48 Bolt Carbine
16:40 Instigator Bolt Carbine
18:00 Bolt Sniper Rifle
20:59 Outro

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down guns from Warhammer 40k: Space Marine 2, and compares them to their potential real-life counterparts.

Firearms Expert Reacts playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4T78VQoWUs&list=PLpg6WLs8kxGMgYb13XjPgOKbm5O-CDq7R

If you're interested in seeing more of Jonathan's work, you can check out more from the Royal Armouries righ
title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2's Guns
